resources.string: Press back again to leave ScrewShop!
Sorry, this isn\'t a Screw\'d device. Exiting...
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery, bootloader or performing a soft reboot
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Enable notification for when the flashlight is on
Disables transition animations such as when launching an app
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Display the number of pending notifications
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast

Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
Pick which apps to exclude from the recents panel
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Change the view of the recents screen
This option will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Customize the swipe shortcuts at the bottom of the lockscreen
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.

Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
This will hide all force close notificaitons
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Press on color below to apply
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put the device to sleep
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
Automatically set a proper color for the led notification if the app has no custom values
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'\u002b\' on the menu bar
screen color controls and night mode
Gesture to enter multiwindow by swiping up from the recents button
Show battery percentage when not charging
Configure what icons are shown on status bar
Volume down for do not disturb
Allow volume down to enter do not disturb mode
Volume up in do not disturb
Allow volume up to exit do not disturb mode
Show do not disturb switch on volume panel
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Enable one tap action to enable or disable data
Longpress power button while screen is off to turn on flashlight
Choose the number of rows and columns
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your SMS notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Display percent on top of the the battery image
Display bolt indicator while charging. Hides percent overlay
Press on color below to apply
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Enable to show Screw\'d logo on the left side of statusbar
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
When enabled, the Screw\'d logo will blink at you.
Choose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Customize Pie targets, sytle, size and color
Whether or not the menu button should always be shown, even when its not needed
Select the location where the Pie will be placed
Adjust the gap that separates the Pie elements
Adjust the angle of pie\'s egdes from the attachment
Manage how animations and status additions will be handled
Enable expand quick settings panel button
Pie will be always shown on the right while in landscape
Enable the old status bar ticker
